page.title: 04The Health Centre
page.content: Birchwood Health Centre opened in 1981 The centre is used for doctor's practices,orthoptist,chiropody,baby, pysiotherapy,and speech therapy clinics,and there is going to be a school dental clinic.Five doctors work in the centre.Twelve nurses including a midwife,school nurses and health visitors are based at the centre.There are 12 administrative staff and two cleaners.The peripatetic workers include the school doctor,speech therapist,chiropodist,psychologist, othoptist and a dietician.The patients come mainly from Birchwood but some come from Cinnamon Brow.About 250 patients are seen each day.The Health centre is situated close to Birchwood Shopping Centre so there are no parking problems.
